3. We will focus on the years from 1922-23 to the end of the table (1930).
4. In these years, BSFC won the Challenge Cup in 1927-28 and 1929-30.
5. They were finalists in 1928-29 (as seen in the row with "esl" league). However, they withdrew from the competition after 6 games, so we cannot count this as a full season in the Challenge Cup.
6. In total, BSFC won the Challenge Cup twice and were finalists once.
7. Since BSFC did not participate in the Challenge Cup before 1922-23, they cannot have been champions or finalists more than four times in total.
8. Therefore, to determine whether BSFC be champion 4 time more often than they be finalist, we need to compare these numbers and see if they meet the condition.
9. In this case, BSFC won the Challenge Cup twice (2) and were finalists once (1), so they did not win it 4 times more often.
